review.description: as people go this place will pick up steam.solid food good prices.nice décor diverse menus and nice wait staff.
review.author: Robert P.

review.description: I had the vegetables (they let you pick 4) and they were so so good! The server was so sweet to me and good with my children which is hard to come by these days! My daughters got the mac and cheese (which I ate of if I'm being honest) so happy to have these guys in my neighborhood now! Been eating at the one in the west village for years! Even saw one of my servers from that one at this one! Nice to still see places that still have that mom and pop vibe.
review.author: Chris S.

review.description: Tried this new location after going to the one in the east village for years. The food and service totally hold up and the bartenders are almost as cute!  ;)
review.author: Doug G.
